name: Transmit the Barbecue
description:
2 player game based on transmission and cooperation.

Global Game-jam January 2018 project
Developed by Natalija Manja and Danilo Nikić.
Starring Miladin Kolarski and Nemanja Stefanović.

Carry the flaming barbecue through the hallways and don't let the hateful neighbor granny stop you.
If you drop it, decide whose fault was it, through a stress releasing  fight.

#startitjam
#globalgamejam
